thread.title: ATA Welcomes Hemmelgarn as District Sales Manager
thread.title_full: ATA Welcomes Hemmelgarn as District Sales Manager - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ATA Welcomes Hemmelgarn as District Sales Manager
text:
American Trucking Associations
ARLINGTON, Va. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- American Trucking Associations announced it has hired Dave Hemmelgarn as the association's newest district sales manager.
"Dave has a long career in the trucking industry and in sales and we're thrilled to have him as part of our regional sales team," said David Brodie , ATA senior vice president of membership. "Dave brings a wealth of experience from each of the stops he's made in his trucking career and has demonstrated a proven ability to succeed in sales."
Prior to joining ATA, Hemmelgarn was regional sales manager at ACS/PrePass, a Xerox company, and spent nine years representing PrePass throughout the Midwest market. His trucking career began at Averitt Express in Cincinnati while studying marketing and management at the University of Cincinnati .
"I've been involved in trucking my entire professional career, so moving on to ATA was the next logical step in that journey," said Hemmelgarn, who will be responsible for sales in Ohio and Michigan .
Hemmelgarn lives in New Bremen, Ohio with his wife and two kids.
American Trucking Associations is the largest national trade association for the trucking industry. Through a federation of 50 affiliated state trucking associations and industry-related conferences and councils, ATA is the voice of the industry America depends on most to move our nation's freight. Follow ATA on Twitter or on Facebook . Trucking Moves America Forward
